The objective prospective study measure completeness strut coverage vessel wall response ( neointima disomogeneity , acquire late incomplete strut apposition ) different time point follow paclitaxel-eluting stent implantation , patient multivessel disease treat stag PCI procedure . Intravascular ultrasound ( IVUS ) perform per normal practice index procedures 9 month elective follow-up .
